comments.content:
Verification code sent in a phonecall. 

You send the verification code in the phonecall maybe? Wording is not great.

discussion.content: There are a few questions with these scenarios and am wondering if the "erification code sent in a phone call" is just a way to say "phone call and do something". We have 5 choices and only 3 are correct and we all know that B and E are incorrect.

Unsolvable for me. 
A - not correct. There is no "verification code" there is #.
B - not correct, of course.
E - is possible in Azure MFA but not possible in O365 MFA so - not correct?

comments.content: Biometric Retinal Scanning is part of Windows Hello anyway and as such is not an MFA method, it would be for a primary authentication method

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACD
Microsoft tried Biometric Retinal Scanning but there were too many instances of attackers stealing people's eyes. (jk)
Answers are correct.
I got this question in the exam on 2023-06-28.
B and E are irrelevant and incorrect

questions.question_text:
A company uses Microsoft 365 services. The company is evaluating multi-factor authentication (MFA) methods.

You need to determine which MFA methods are supported in Microsoft 365.

Which three methods are supported? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.A: verification code sent in a phone call
choices.C: verification code sent in a text message

questions.question_text:
A company is evaluating Microsoft 365.

You need to identify applications that are part of Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise.

Which three applications should you identify? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content:
Teams not included anymore. Probably need to get it with add-on these days.

As of October 23rd, 2023, new installations of Microsoft 365 and Office 365 will include Teams only if a Teams service plan is in place. For more information on available plans, see Microsoft Teams service description
Correct

Correct

Apps Included: Outlook, OneDrive, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Microsoft Teams

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/enterprise/microsoft-365-apps-for-enterprise-product?activetab=pivot%3aoverviewtab

discussion.content: was in exam june15,2023
The given answers are ALL CORRECT

It's simple.
Only in MICROSOFT 365 E3 you can use Windows on your PC....
Office 365 E3 is only Office Suite, not bitlocker.
Windows 365 is a Cloud PC, not on-premises.
Dynamics.....serious that you think on it?

Only Microsoft 365 E3 for this case...

Selected Answer: B
Answer: B. Microsoft 365 E3

Microsoft 365 E3 is the only license that includes Windows Enterprise, which is required for BitLocker. BitLocker is a Windows Enterprise feature, not a standalone service or cloud application.

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compare-microsoft-365-enterprise-plans

Selected Answer: B
correct

Selected Answer: C
Windows 365 Standard

In the question, it ask for which license include BitLocker?
Only the B.Microsoft 365 E3 include the Windows Enterprise licence which has the BitLocker.
